sentences.en: A day, pangolin found a barrow again.
sentences.cn: 一天, 穿山甲又找到了一座古墓.

sentences.en: Also a diagonal backward arrow , works the same as a normal barrow.
sentences.cn: 另外,斜向向后拉线和通常的向后拉线效果相同.

sentences.en: Barrow a large mound of earth or stones placed a burial site.
sentences.cn: 冢,古坟:在埋葬地上堆起的土丘或石丘.
巴罗天生就爱打听别人隐私。

sentences.en: He came, bushing a barrow along.
He came, pushing a barrow along.
I usually dig in a small barrow load of compost in late summer.
sentences.cn: 夏末时节，我通常会把一小车堆肥施到土里。

sentences.en: Pomeroy was a cockney barrow-boy at heart.
sentences.cn: 波默罗伊本质上就是个伦敦街头小贩。

sentences.en: The old man lifted the barrow and trundled it away.
sentences.cn: 那个老头提起手推车，慢慢推走了。

sentences.en: They worked on the barrow late into the night.
sentences.cn: 他们修这辆手推车一直修到深夜.

sentences.en: This school is so much different from BHS ( Barrow High School ).
sentences.cn: 这里的高中班级数和学科数都比较多,而且食物也美味了许多.

sentences.en: Would you rather push the barrow or pull it?
sentences.cn: 这辆小车你愿意推呢,还是愿意拉 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 搬运架，[车辆]手推车；弃矿；古坟

trans.tran_cn: 独轮车，双轮手推车，古坟，阉猪
trans.tran_en: a small vehicle like a box on wheels, from which fruits, vegetables etc used to be sold
